sentence.Network_en: My year was really spent doing a lot of soul-searching and trying to find out what had gone wrong in my life.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一年来，我真的进行了许多深刻的反思，努力地找出自己的生活中到底哪里出了问题。

sentence.Network_en: Defining a company's range goals is a painful, soul - searching process.
sentence.Network_cn: 确定公司的长程目标,是一个痛苦的, 自我反省的过程.

sentence.Network_en: A recap of the past few years spent soul searching.
sentence.Network_cn: 回顾一下这些年来的心灵探索.

entry.def: Soul-searching is a long and careful examination of your thoughts and feelings, especially when you are trying to make a difficult moral decision or thinking about something that has gone wrong.

example.ex: My year was really spent doing a lot of soul-searching and trying to find out what had gone wrong in my life.
example.tran: 这一年来，我真的进行了许多深刻的反思，努力地找出自己的生活中到底哪里出了问题。

means.word_mean: 1. a penetrating examination of your own beliefs and motives
